about_the_game:
"Dream Poem" is a casual elimination game, born out of Chinese poetry culture.

You don't need a background of cultural knowledge or to learn Chinese characters. If you enjoy elimination games, if you can select words by looking at the graphics, and if you play a few more rounds, we assure you that even if you don't recognize Chinese characters, you will be able to remember these poems.

This game is easy to get started, but the difficulty of the final clearance is a little bit high.

You can choose the poem you want to eliminate according to your personal preference before the start of each game, and then enter the level to play the elimination game.

After the game starts, you need to first observe which characters are in each line of poetry (vertical) you selected above, and then select all the characters contained in any line of poetry in the text area below.

When the characters in the right-hand card area match the characters in the poem, this line of poetry can be eliminated; if all the lines of poetry are eliminated, you successfully enter the next level.



As the level of the level increases, the number of poems and the length and number of characters of the poems will increase; the more optional characters, the higher the difficulty, and the more points you can get when you eliminate them.

Choosing poetry is a strategy, whether you want to pass the level more easily or want to challenge higher scores, it is determined by the poetry you choose.

However, even if you have the eyes of an eagle, the ears of a wolf, the speed of a leopard, and the strength of a bear, there will always be times when you can't take care of it and make mistakes. At this time, you need to rely on props to solve the difficulty.



There are 9 kinds of props in total:

Props 1-3 correspond to eliminating 1, 2, and 3 lines of poetry, these props can help you pass the level faster;

4 is to clear the right-hand card area, 5 is to refresh the characters displayed in the text area, and 6 is to clear all the characters in the text area. These props can help you solve the mistakes in the game and provide more opportunities;

Props 7-9 correspond to pauses for 10 seconds, 30 seconds, and 60 seconds respectively, these props provide you with more observation and thinking time;

You can get one of each kind of prop in each game. After using it, you can use diamonds for random purchase, but the number of times to buy props is limited.



If you want to get more prop purchase times, you need to constantly eliminate poetry in the game to unlock the original authors (poets) of these poems; the number of prop purchases will increase with the number of poets unlocked.

When you successfully eliminate a new poem, the poem illustration will be unlocked. Once the number of poems created by the same poet meets the conditions, the poet illustration can be unlocked.



To buy enough props in the game, you also need to collect enough diamonds in the poem illustration; you can harvest a certain amount of diamonds every minute in the illustration, and the more diamonds you produce, the more poems you unlock.



Finally, if you are tired of playing games, you can open the poems in the illustrations and slowly appreciate the original text, pronunciation, and related translations of the poems.

name: DreamyPoems
short_description: "Dream Poem" is a casual elimination game, born out of Chinese poetry culture. Like many traditional games, you only need to select the correct words according to the graphics to enjoy the fun of elimination. You don't need a background of cultural knowledge or to learn Chinese characters.
